title: description
Ashanti's Foolish: A cold variant of the Royal Fizz. As cold as Ashanti's hurtin.

title: notes
Ashanti's Foolish: Lemon, Juice and a dash of something.

title: pairing
Ashanti's Foolish: Ashanti has it with a cold Sirloin Steak with Onions and cronut.

title: serving_suggestion
Ashanti's Foolish: Fill with ice, soda. Drink to the many sounds of Foolish.
